briefTitle: Psychotherapy to Patients With Primary Breast Cancer - Psycho-social and Survival Outcome From a Randomised Trial
officialTitle: Psychosocial Group Intervention to Patients With Primary Breast Cancer - Psychosocial and Survival Outcome From a Randomised Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Eligible patients were 18-70 years of age with stage I-IIIA primary breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Distant metastasis
* Not speaking or understanding Danish
* Over 71 years
* Other life-threatening diseases
* Brain-damaged
